name: Slice (itch) (PassiGames)
description:
This is a game, where 2 players battle each other in an ice hockey battle. Try to take the puk away from your enemy and shoot it in the opponent's goal! Who reaches 10 goals first is the winner!

Controls: left player:
  • move: wasd
  • shoot: f
right player:
  • move: arrow keys
  • shoot: 0 ("zero")
menu:
  • open/close: m/p or click the bar

Have fun!

PLAY
